base_description: Analyzing the topology, we find 6 nodes and 7 branches in this circuit. The passive components include 4 resistive element(s). Energy is supplied through 1 voltage source(s), 2 current source(s). There are no controlled sources in this circuit. Measurement setup includes 1 voltage measurement(s). In total, this circuit comprises 7 circuit elements.

edits.instruction: Update resistor 2: change its value from 50立 to 250k立.
Change the DC current source (labeled 1) from 72A to 7A.
